item.title: How Java Works
item.description: This is the first of a series of blogs I will write in Java. Today I will discuss How Java Works. This is an optional blog, if anyone is interested to know java more, you can go over it. First we need to understand some concepts. A high-level (also called third-generation) programming languages allow you to write programs in a language similar to natural language, in other word Human readable. The high-level program is called the source code.
